alert.note: Alert for Burt; Dodge; Douglas; Saunders; Washington (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 7:39PM CDT until May 12 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Burt County in east central Nebraska... Washington County in east central Nebraska... Eastern Dodge County in east central Nebraska... Western Douglas County in east central Nebraska... Eastern Saunders County in east central Nebraska... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 738 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles southeast of Uehling to 5 miles south of Yutan, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Waterloo around 750 PM CDT. Elkhorn and Zorinsky Lake around 755 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Herman, Flanagan Lake, Tekamah, Boys Town and Standing Bear Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
